step_feedback.feedback: You did a good job stretching your arm overhead. Try to keep your shoulder and elbow a little straighter for maximum resistance.
Your arm was mostly overhead. Focus on keeping your elbow and wrist straighter to increase the pumping action.
You opened your hand well. Aim for a tighter fist and straighter elbow to enhance the muscle pump.
You relaxed your hand nicely. Try to keep your arm straighter overhead and your fist tighter when inhaling.

exercise_summary: You're doing great with the overhead pumping! Remember to stretch your arm fully overhead and make a tight fist while breathing in. Then, relax your hand as you breathe out to help move fluid.
